sentences: Sean Bergin (29 June 1948 â€“ 1 September 2012) was an avant-garde jazz saxophonist and flautist from South Africa.
Bergin was born in Durban on 29 June 1948.
He won the VPRO/Boy Edgar Award in 2000.
